mapper.select: select c.id, c.smsSwitch from coach c inner join tuser t on c.tuserId = t.id where t.phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber} and t.password = #{password}
select c.id from coach c inner join tuser t on c.tuserId = t.id where t.phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber} and t.status != #{status}
select c.id from coach c inner join tuser t on c.tuserId = t.id and t.status = 0 where c.id=#{coachId} and c.qrcodeToken = #{token}
mapper.insert: insert into coach(registerType, qqId, weixinId, weiboId, qqUsername, weixinUsername, weiboUsername, avatarUrl, createTime, lastAccessTime, type, tuserId, smsSwitch) value (#{registerType}, #{qqId}, #{weixinId}, #{weiboId}, #{qqUsername}, #{weixinUsername}, #{weiboUsername}, #{avatarUrl}, now(), now(), #{type}, #{tuserId}, #{smsSwitch})
mapper.update: update tuser t set t.password = #{password} where t.phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}
update coach set lastAccessTime = now() where id = #{coachId}
